title: Event Cinema in the Post-Pandemic Era
itunes:title: Event Cinema in the Post-Pandemic Era
description:
Ray Nutt, CEO at movie-theater-chain-owned Fathom Events, discusses the return of event cinema. Hosts: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
